description: Everyone loves a jacket potato and this rich and cheesy smoked cod filling makes them extra delicious.
name: Cheesy Smoked Cod Jacket Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Prick the potatoes with a fork, place on a baking tray and bake for 50 minutes.
Place the smoked cod in a bowl with just enough water to cover and set aside for 10 minutes. Flake and pick out any remaining bones.

Slice the potatoes in half and carefully scoop the centres into a bowl, leaving enough potato in the skin to form a shell. Mix the potato in a bowl with the smoked cod, spring onions, creme fraiche, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, mustard and cheddar.
Bake for 15-20 minutes until golden and bubbling.
